short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Support free culture by automatically sending cryptocurrency to the creators of the content you love.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Support free culture by automatically sending cryptocurrency to the creators of the content you love.

Thankful gives you the possibility to support online creators using cryptocurrency. By tracking your online activity Thankful gives you a suggestion of how to distribute your donations, based on how you spent your time.
